definition: to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue

sentences.english: If you may have any question, please leave them below.
sentences.chinese: 西蒙妮有任何问题，请在预告下方留言。

sentences.english: In the third part, the author discuss the improvement of the China's real estate pre-sale and register notice system.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分是我国商品房预售预告登记制度的完善。

sentences.english: From the looks of the promo video for the sixth season of House, the season's going to be good.
sentences.chinese: 我们从第六季的预告来看，这季会很好看哦。

sentences.english: Not due to sign a confidentiality agreement with you in advance notice, I am sorry. Edit translation.
sentences.chinese: 因签下了保密协议未能预先跟各位预告，实在抱歉。

sentences.english: The first trailer is out for the "Conan the Barbarian" reboot.
sentences.chinese: 第一个预告片是出于《野蛮人柯南》的重归。

sentences.english: Watch the trailer in High Definition on Yahoo.
sentences.chinese: 雅虎上可以观看高清版预告片。

sentences.english: Nintendo showed off a few trailers of 3-D movies such as How To Train Your Dragon on the 3DS.
sentences.chinese: 任天堂展示了《驯龙高手》等几部3D影片的预告片。

sentences.english: The demo over, it was time for player Q&A.
sentences.chinese: 预告结束，现在是问答时间。

sentences.english: In England the cuckoo is the herald of spring.
sentences.chinese: 在英国，杜鹃鸟预告春天的来临。

sentences.english: A trailer of the episode could be seen after the break.
sentences.chinese: 而这个节目的预告片于文章的尾段可看到。

sentences.english: What is the song in the red-band trailer?
sentences.chinese: 电影预告片中使用的歌曲是什么？

sentences.english: From the looks of the trailer, she won’t disappoint here.
sentences.chinese: 从预告片看，平托的表演是不会让我们失望的。

sentences.english: Electronic programme guide service with programme schedule and highlights for all channels.
sentences.chinese: 电子节目指南，预告各台节目及播放最新宣传片段。

sentences.english: Notice how the trailer even includes a nuclear explosion.
sentences.chinese: 注意预告片甚至还加上了一段核爆炸。

sentences.english: Also can use this method to undertake fore-and-aft confluence forecasts much sensor data.
sentences.chinese: 也可以采用该方法进行多传感器数据纵向融合预告。

sentences.english: Last night the guangdong People's Broadcasting Station announced that a typhoon was approaching.
sentences.chinese: 昨夜广东人民广播电台预告台风快要来临。

definition: painted eggshell/Easter egg/(media) Easter egg (hidden feature in software or a movie etc)/post-credits scene
news from behind the scenes/stage gossip
to expose (photography)/(fig.) to expose (a scandal)/(advertising) exposure/Taiwan pr. [pu4 guang1]
to broadcast/to air (a TV program etc)
to release/to issue/to announce/to distribute/also written 發布|发布[fa1 bu4]
